issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.description: The NFS service makes rpc call to the portmap but the timeout is hardcoded. Tests on slow virtual machines sometimes fail due to timeout. We should make the timeout configurable, with the same default value as current value.
fields.summary: The rpc to portmap service for NFS has hardcoded timeout.

comments.body: This patch adds a new configuration key for portmap connection timeout

I am +1 otherwise, I will commit once this is addressed followed by a jenkins run.
